body_html:
@danmane The next steps would be to start using SWIG to wrap the appropriate features. I was working in this branch: master...peterbraden:nodejs-wip

I don't really have much time to work on this at present. If you need to close the PR that's fine, but if somebody continues the attempt in the future, then this will be a good starting point, so some way of pointing them to this would be good.

body:
@danmane The next steps would be to start using SWIG to wrap the appropriate features. I was working in this branch: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/compare/master...peterbraden:nodejs-wip

I don't really have much time to work on this at present. If you need to close the PR that's fine, but if somebody continues the attempt in the future, then this will be a good starting point, so some way of pointing them to this would be good.
